p: Dengue virus serotype-2 strain ST (DENV) was collected from the Singapore General Hospital in 1997 [ 61]. DENV was propagated alternatively in Vero (ATCC CCL-81) and C6/36 (ATCC CRL-1660) cells. Virus titer was determined by plaque assay using BHK-21 cells. DENV supernatant was exposed to UV light from biosafety cabinet (Sterilgard III advance, the Baker Company) for 1h at room temperature for inactivation.
